Dropdowns.Title: MSAA Level
Dropdowns.Description: Adjust the level of antialiasing to improve visual quality and reduce jagged edges.

Dropdowns.Title: Graphics Renderer
Dropdowns.Description: Select the graphics renderer to determine how the game renders visual elements.

Toggles.Title: Force High Graphics
Toggles.Description: Enable high-quality graphics, improving visual fidelity but potentially lowering performance.

Toggles.Title: Enable Proxy
Toggles.Description: Activates proxy settings to manage network traffic through an intermediary server.

Toggles.Title: Log Network Requests
Toggles.Description: Log all network requests made by the application for debugging and analysis purposes.

Toggles.Title: Occulusion Culling
Toggles.Description: Enable occlusion culling to optimize performance by not rendering objects that are blocked by others.

Toggles.Title: Show Flags
Toggles.Description: Display a list of all enabled flags for debugging and configuration monitoring.

Toggles.Title: Enable Internal
Toggles.Description: Activate internal features of the platform, intended for testing or advanced users.

Toggles.Title: Classic Font
Toggles.Description: Restore the classic font style for a nostalgic or familiar appearance.

Toggles.Title: Faster Menu
Toggles.Description: Increase the speed of menu animations for a quicker, snappier experience.

Toggles.Title: Disable Updates
Toggles.Description: Turn off automatic updates to prevent the application from downloading or installing new versions.

Type.Title: Max FPS
Type.Description: Set a limit on the maximum frames per second to control performance and reduce hardware load.

Type.Title: Font Size
Type.Description: Adjust the size of the text used in the interface for improved readability or compactness.

Type.Title: CoreGUI Transparency
Type.Description: Control the transparency level of the CoreGUI, making the interface more or less transparent.

Type.Title: Scroll Delta
Type.Description: Modify the sensitivity of mouse scrolling, adjusting how much content moves per scroll event.
